[by:ĺ˘¨éŁ12138]
[00:00.00]And stay, stay, stay, another round
[00:04.30]'Cause who wants to live forever?
[00:07.00]Who wants to burn it down?
[00:09.35]Down, down, down, down
[00:12.14]And we can paint the town
[00:14.19]'Cause who wants to sing the blues?
[00:16.40]So some you win or some you lose
[00:19.13]It's all a catch-22
[00:20.17]Yeah, I could be getting old, but I'm getting round
[00:22.48]Call it immature, sure, but hear me out
[00:25.10]'Cause the only thing promised is the here and now
[00:27.35]If we didn't live it up, never live it down, yeah
[00:30.37]And when I jump I hold on, I'm like, "Oh my Lord"
[00:33.22]If it all goes wrong then it's all my fault
[00:35.61]Man, some just want to watch your world burn
[00:38.24]But some on the straight and narrow lost first turn, so
[00:40.83]Before you play, take a page of my own advice
[00:43.25]It's all a game, know the price when you roll the dice
[00:45.91]And what's the rush man? Nowhere else to go tonight
[00:48.25]And we ain't getting out on time, let alone alive
[00:50.79]The choice is yours, your down for the cause
[00:52.95]Be hated or adored, but never ignored
[00:55.20]And whatever card you draw you can't win them all
[00:57.68]So leave the sad songs at the door, get involved and
[Hook: Anne-Marie & Illy]
[01:00.34]And stay, stay, stay, another round

[01:27.95]It's all a catch-22
[01:29.95]Oh, you're not happy where you at heart, fuck it off then
[01:32.69]Just make it not for nothing when you cut your losses
[01:35.12]You haven't got it made, but you got your options
[01:37.63]Ditch smokes for sleep, ditch shots for crossfit
[01:39.94]What you tryna live longer? Take a bow
[01:42.60]What's the point of all those years if you spend them missing out?
[01:44.76]Some of it's worth the risk, hoping you don't forget
[01:47.30]Bad as the world can get none of it's permanent
[01:49.52]So no politics or parties, even if
[01:51.58]We solving world problems with our lager on our lips
[01:54.41]And for all the easy ways out, the harder that it gets
[01:56.90]Now isn't that ironic? No Alanis Morissette
[01:59.43]We a hard act to follow, pouring the bottle
[02:01.91]YOLO the motto, could all end tomorrow
[02:04.26]Set your watch fast, stay ahead of your time
[02:06.55]If you wait, might never arrive, that's the vibe so
